price: Sema: Mwenyezi Mungu hukuokoeni kutoka hayo, na kutoka kila mashaka, na kisha nyinyi mnamshirikisha!
arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يُنَجِّيكُم مِّنۡهَا وَمِن كُلِّ كَرۡبٖ ثُمَّ أَنتُمۡ تُشۡرِكُونَ
footnotes: Sema: Ni Allah, Mwenyezi Mungu wa pekee, ndiye aliye kuokoeni na vitisho hivi, na kila shida nyengineyo. Na kisha nyinyi pamoja na hayo mnamshirikisha na wengine katika ibada, ambao hawawezi kuondoa shari wala kuleta kheri!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: quli al-lahu yunajjīkum min'hā wamin kulli karbin thumma antum tush'rikūna
